verses.verse: In<WG1722> those<WG1565> days<WG2250> the multitude<WG3793> being<WG5607> very great<WG3827>, and<WG2532> having<WG2192> nothing<WG3361><WG5101> to eat<WG5315>, Jesus<WG2424> called<WG4341> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> unto him, and saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>,

¶ And<WG2532> straightway<WG2112> he entered<WG1684> into<WG1519> a ship<WG4143> with<WG3326> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, and came<WG2064> into<WG1519> the parts<WG3313> of Dalmanutha<WG1148>.

After<WG1534> that he put<WG2007> his hands<WG5495> again<WG3825> upon<WG1909> his<WG846> eyes<WG3788>, and<WG2532> made<WG4160> him<WG846> look up<WG308>: and<WG2532> he was restored<WG600>, and<WG2532> saw<WG1689> every man<WG537> clearly<WG5081>.

And<WG2532> he sent<WG649> him<WG846> away<WG649> to<WG1519> his<WG846> house<WG3624>, saying<WG3004>, Neither <WG3366> go <WG1525> into <WG1519> the town <WG2968> , nor <WG3366> tell <WG2036> it to any <WG5100> in <WG1722> the town <WG2968> .

¶ And<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> went out<WG1831>, and<WG2532> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, into<WG1519> the towns<WG2968> of Caesarea<WG2542> Philippi<WG5376>: and<WG2532> by<WG1722> the way<WG3598> he asked<WG1905> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, saying<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Whom <WG5101> do <WG3004> men <WG444> say <WG3004> that I <WG3165> am <WG1511> ?
